attributes.action: Cancel 2021 GCSE’s and A level exams in England and Northern Ireland
attributes.background: Cancel 2021 GCSE’s and A level exams in England and Northern Ireland Prior to Wales as people are affected by the COVID-19 pandemic by the huge impact it’s had on students learning.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
